ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Repeated, disturbing memories, thoughts, or images of a stressful experience from the past
Notes: 1=not at all; 2= a little bit; 3=moderately; 4=quite a bit; 5= extremely; 999=NA/NK/missing/Refused

ElementDescription: Repeated, disturbing dreams of a stressful experience from the past
Notes: 1=not at all; 2= a little bit; 3=moderately; 4=quite a bit; 5= extremely; 999=NA/NK/missing/Refused

ElementDescription: Suddenly acting or feeling as if a stressful experience were happening again (as if you were reliving it)

ElementDescription: Feeling very upset when something reminded you of a stressful experience from the past

ElementDescription: Having physical reactions (e.g., heart pounding, trouble breathing, sweating) when something reminded you of astressful experience from the past

ElementDescription: Change Score PCLC
Notes: 1:less than 34

ElementDescription: 40 percent or more reduction from PCLC
Notes: (IF (MOSTDISTRESSING_AD=2) THEN DO; IF (PCLCt2 >.) THEN RMTMPCLCt2=0; IF (.< PCLCt2 <= 34) THEN RMTMPCLCt2=1; IF (PCLCt1>=0 & PCLCt2>=0) THEN DO; R40MPCLCt2=0; IF (RMTMPCLCt2=1) THEN R40MPCLCt2=1; ELSE IF (PCLCt2 <= (0.60 * PCLCt1)) THEN R40MPCLCt2=1; END; END;)
